sentence.Network_en: Big credits were given to East Germany by successive West German governments.
sentence.Network_cn: 历届西德政府给予东德大量的贷款。

sentence.Network_en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentence.Network_en: The government counted 27,600,000 employed persons in West Germany.
sentence.Network_cn: 据政府统计，西德当时的就业人数为2,760万人。

means.word_mean: 1. a resident of the west side of Manhattan in New York City
